mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices(noticesno, noticenumber, imageurl, receiptdate, species, gender, discoveryplace, characteristic, state, publicnoticestart, publicnoticeend, colorcd, age, weight, orgnm, careaddr, officetel, carenm) VALUES(notices_seq.nextval, #{noticenumber}, #{imageurl}, #{receiptdate}, #{species}, #{gender}, #{discoveryplace}, #{characteristic}, #{state}, #{publicnoticestart}, #{publicnoticeend}, #{colorcd}, #{age}, #{weight}, #{orgnm}, #{careaddr}, #{officetel}, #{carenm})
mapper.select: SELECT noticesno, noticenumber, imageurl, receiptdate, species, gender, discoveryplace, characteristic, state, publicnoticestart, publicnoticeend, colorcd, age, weight, orgnm, careaddr, officetel, carenm FROM NOTICES ORDER BY noticesno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM NOTICES
WHERE (UPPER(noticenumber) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(species) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(discoveryplace) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(characteristic) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(colorcd) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(orgnm) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(careaddr) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
